pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identify Individuals with Unusual Geo-Genetic Patterns // Identify and visualize individuals with unusual association patterns of genetics and geography using the approach of Chang and Schmid (2023) doi:10.1101/2023.04.06.535838. It detects potential outliers that violate the isolation-by-distance assumption using the K-nearest neighbor approach. You can obtain a table of outliers with statistics and visualize unusual geo-genetic patterns on a geographical map. This is useful for landscape genomics studies to discover individuals with unusual geography and genetics associations from a large biological sample.
